text:
COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA
Proposed Resolution 20-990 (Deemed Approved November 8, 2014)

20 DCSTAT 4729

A PROPOSED RESOLUTION

Officially Read
September 23,
2014

To confirm the reappointment of Mr. Timothy Mahoney to the Board of Respiratory Care.

RESOLVED, BY THE COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA, That this
resolution may be cited as the "Board of Respiratory Care Timothy Mahoney Confirmation
Resolution of 2014".
Sec.2. The Council of the District of Columbia confirms the reappointment of:
Timothy Mahoney
4405 35th St., N.W.
Washington D.C. 20008
(Ward 3)
as a licensed respiratory therapist member of the Board of Respiratory Care, in accordance with
section 2(f) of the Confirmation Act of 1978, effective March 3, 1979 (D.C. Law 2-142; D.C.
Official Code § 1-523.01(f)), and pursuant to section 2 14 of the District of Columbia Health
Occupations Revision Act of 1985, effective March 25, 1986 (D.C. Law 6-99; D.C. Official
Code § 3-1202. 14), for a term to end July 17, 2017.
Sec. 3. The Council of the District of Columbia shall transmit a copy of this resolution,
upon its adoption, each to the nominee and to the Office of the Mayor.
Sec. 4. This resolution shall take effect immediately.

Board of
Respiratory
Care Timothy
Mahoney
Confirmation
Resolution of
2014
